name: Watermelon Lemonade
description: A light and refreshing summer drink
directions: Place the watermelon into a blender and mix unter it's smooth.
Boil the sugear and 1/2 cup of water on medium heat until sugar dissolves.
Remove the mix from the heat and and stir 3 cups of cold water and lemon juice.
Scoop 2-3 tablespoons of watermelon into a cup.
Add the ice cubes and the lemonade.
